Customer experience (CX) is the overall impression customers have of your brand throughout their interactions with your business. It encompasses everything from the initial marketing message to the post-purchase support they receive. Think of it as the customer journey, and CX is all the touchpoints along the way that shape their perception.


Key Areas of CX

  • Customer touchpoints: Every interaction a customer has with your brand, like websites, social media, advertising, in-store experience, and customer service.

  • Customer journey: Mapping out the steps a customer takes to interact with your brand, from awareness to purchase and beyond.

  • Customer satisfaction: How happy customers are with your product or service.

  • Customer loyalty: How likely customers are to return and recommend your brand to others.


CX Frameworks

Frameworks provide a structured approach to improving CX. Here are two common ones:

  • Customer Experience Journey Map: A visual representation of the customer journey, identifying touchpoints and opportunities for improvement.

  • Five Service Dimensions: A framework that focuses on five key aspects of service quality: reliability, responsiveness, assurance, empathy, and tangibles.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Companies:

  1. Improved Customer Satisfaction and Loyalty: CXM focuses on understanding and meeting customer needs, leading to increased satisfaction and a higher likelihood of repeat business.

  2. Enhanced Brand Reputation: Positive customer experiences contribute to a strong brand reputation, attracting new customers and retaining existing ones.

  3. Increased Revenue and Profitability: Satisfied customers are more likely to spend more, refer others, and remain loyal, all of which contribute to revenue growth.

  4. Competitive Advantage: In today's crowded marketplace, exceptional customer experience can be a key differentiator, setting a company apart from its competitors.

  5. Reduced Costs: Resolving customer issues proactively and efficiently can reduce the cost of customer service and support.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Building a Career as a Manager:

  1. In-demand Skill: CXM is a highly sought-after skill in today's business world, as companies increasingly recognize its importance.

  2. Career Advancement: Expertise in CXM can open doors to various managerial roles, such as Customer Experience Manager, Customer Success Manager, or Marketing Manager.

  3. Problem-solving Skills: CXM involves identifying and addressing customer pain points, which enhances problem-solving and analytical skills.

  4. Leadership Development: Managing customer experience initiatives requires strong leadership, communication, and collaboration skills.

  5. Cross-functional Collaboration: CXM often involves working with multiple departments, providing managers with exposure to different areas of the business.


Overall, learning CXM is crucial for companies looking to thrive in the modern business landscape. It's also a valuable investment for managers aiming to build a successful career in various industries.


What is Marketing?

  • Definition: Marketing is the process of identifying customer needs, creating products or services that fulfill those needs, and communicating the value of those offerings to potential customers.

  • Focus: Marketing focuses on getting the right message to the right audience, ultimately driving interest and sales.

  • Key Activities:

    • Market research

    • Product development

    • Brand building

    • Advertising and promotions

    • Content creation

    • Customer relationship management


What is Marketing Management?

  • Definition: Marketing management is the strategic and operational process of planning, organizing, implementing, and controlling an organization's marketing resources and activities.

  • Focus: Marketing management aims to create a cohesive marketing plan, optimize resource allocation, and measure the effectiveness of marketing initiatives.

  • Key Activities:

    • Developing marketing strategies and plans

    • Setting marketing budgets

    • Managing marketing teams

    • Overseeing marketing campaigns

    • Analyzing marketing performance (tracking metrics and ROI)

    • Making adjustments to strategies as needed


The Relationship Between Marketing and Marketing Management

Think of marketing as the actions you take to promote your business, and marketing management as the overarching system to plan, execute, and refine those actions strategically.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in marketing and business

Unlock Your GMAT Math Success with Our Comprehensive Course!

Are you a GMAT beginner aiming for a solid math foundation, or an advanced student seeking to conquer expert-level questions and concepts? Look no further! Our GMAT Math course is meticulously crafted to cater to learners of all levels, ensuring that everyone can master GMAT math, regardless of how long it's been since you last tackled math.

This course is your key to GMAT Quantitative excellence, and here's why:

  1. Comprehensive Coverage: Our course is the result of years of instructor experience and covers every topic you'll encounter on the GMAT. We've scoured various GMAT resources to ensure you're fully prepared.

  2. Calculator-Free Skills: Since GMAT doesn't allow calculators, we've placed special emphasis on sharpening your mental math skills and equipping you with time-saving shortcuts. Say goodbye to relying on calculators forever!

  3. Regular Updates: This course isn't static. We continually update it, adding new topics and addressing any areas that need further explanation. Your learning journey is our top priority.

  4. Student-Centric Learning: Your input matters! We encourage students to share topics they'd like to explore further, and we incorporate these requests into the course. This is your course, tailored to your needs.

  5. Advanced-Level Practice: For those looking for an extra challenge, we provide four full-length tests, thoroughly solved. These tests cover nearly every type of word problem you might encounter on the GMAT. More tests are in the pipeline!

  6. Geometry Optional: With the new GMAT focus, geometry is no longer a part of the test. However, we've kept our geometry sections in the course as optional content. They might come in handy for other test preparations.

  7. Quadratics Bonus: For absolute beginners, we've included a bonus section at the end of the course that introduces you to quadratics from the ground up. This section is perfect for those who need a refresher or are entirely new to the topic.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Formação Completa ChatGPT & IAs Generativas

Você está pronto para começar cada dia com um aliado, um assistente pessoal extremamente talentoso, pronto para realizar suas tarefas com precisão e rapidez incomparáveis?

Uma IA capaz de redigir seus e-mails, artigos ou relatórios, criar imagens inspiradoras, analisar dados complexos, programar soluções sob medida e resolver uma infinidade de problemas, permitindo que você se concentre no que realmente importa.

Para aproveitar todos esses benefícios da IA, é essencial dominá-la. Muitas pessoas se empolgam, fazem 2 ou 3 prompts e acabam abandonando o assunto sem descobrir o verdadeiro potencial da inteligência artificial. Esse comportamento muitas vezes revela um desconhecimento das técnicas, métodos e configurações que permitem obter os melhores resultados com a IA.

O objetivo desta formação é fornecer todas as chaves para comunicar eficazmente com a IA, configurá-la da melhor forma e aproveitá-la ao máximo.

Para alcançar isso, concebi um percurso conciso e dinâmico que permitirá a você desenvolver os conhecimentos e competências essenciais para a utilização otimizada da IA.

Durante esta formação, veremos juntos:

  • Como formular requisições claras para a IA para obter as melhores respostas possíveis.

  • Como configurar o ChatGPT para que ele se torne seu professor, co-fundador ou analista de confiança.

  • Como gerar múltiplas ideias e se tornar melhor no seu trabalho, mais produtivo, rápido, relevante e eficiente.

  • Como aproveitar ao máximo a multimodalidade do ChatGPT para escrever, falar, ouvir, transmitir imagens e pedir que ele as interprete.

  • Como fazer o Dall-e ou o Copilot gerar as melhores imagens possíveis.

  • Como encontrar alternativas interessantes para a versão paga do ChatGPT.

  • Exploraremos outras IAs como Copilot, Claude e Gemini.

  • Veremos como adaptar o ChatGPT às suas preferências e necessidades específicas para respostas personalizadas.

  • Vamos descobrir como potencializar o ChatGPT com os GPTs: como usar essas aplicações e até mesmo como criá-las sem ser um desenvolvedor.

  • Exploraremos tópicos mais técnicos no final da formação, como gerenciamento de API, playground, integração do ChatGPT com outros softwares como Excel ou Google Sheets, por exemplo.

  • E, sobretudo, veremos que tudo isso é acessível a todos, mesmo aos iniciantes.

Nesta formação, você encontrará:

  • Demonstrações concretas.

  • Fichas técnicas e guias práticos para download.

Em resumo, você está prestes a seguir um curso claro, acessível e envolvente. Detalhado o suficiente para cobrir os conceitos essenciais sem se prolongar demais. Não importa o seu nível de partida, seja você iniciante ou esteja em busca de técnicas avançadas, esta é a única formação que você precisará para dominar o ChatGPT.

Meu nome é Yassine Rochd, sou fundador de uma organização de treinamento que ajudou milhares de aprendizes a alcançar seus objetivos profissionais. Sou também apaixonado por tecnologia. Após um mestrado em finanças e experiências em consultoria e fundos de investimento, fiz uma formação em desenvolvimento web e passei centenas de horas descobrindo e utilizando IAs. Hoje, desejo transmitir de forma clara o que aprendi nos últimos anos.

Certificação e Garantia:

  • Ao concluir esta formação, você receberá uma certificação que poderá compartilhar até mesmo no LinkedIn.

  • Esta formação é também sem riscos, pois você tem uma garantia de "satisfação ou reembolso" de 30 dias.

  • Você terá acesso vitalício à formação e aos recursos para download.

Você está a um clique de dominar uma tecnologia extremamente útil que tornará você mais eficiente, mais produtivo e simplesmente indispensável.


Detalhamento das Diferentes Seções deste Curso

Introdução Rápida ao ChatGPT

Descubra como dominar rapidamente o ChatGPT em apenas alguns vídeos. Mergulhe na interface intuitiva do ChatGPT e aprenda a criar seus primeiros prompts para aproveitar ao máximo o poder da IA. Seja para gerar tabelas, fazer brainstorming, gerar ideias, traduzir e corrigir textos, ou até redigir diversos conteúdos, você será mais rápido e eficiente com a IA. Descubra como o ChatGPT pode ajudá-lo na sua busca de emprego e se adaptar às suas necessidades profissionais para aumentar sua eficiência. Você verá que o ChatGPT é capaz de criar uma variedade de conteúdos, desde e-mails e cartas até artigos e postagens para redes sociais, sem esquecer a redação de códigos de programação.

Fundamentos do Prompt Engineering

Aprenda por que o prompt engineering é essencial e como ele pode transformar o ChatGPT em um verdadeiro especialista. Compreenda a importância do contexto e dos objetivos para estruturar suas interações, e descubra como ajustar o formato e a temperatura para otimizar seus prompts e variar o nível de criatividade do modelo. Personalize suas interações dominando o tom e o estilo, e aproveite 5 dicas práticas para obter respostas ainda mais pertinentes do ChatGPT.

Técnicas Avançadas de Prompt Engineering

Nesta seção, veremos como criar prompts que geram outros prompts. Estudaremos o método de reverse engineering, funcionalidades de busca na web, interpretação de imagens e muitas outras técnicas avançadas.

Dall-e

Em seguida, abordaremos a geração de imagens com Dall-e. Você verá como passar de um resultado mediano a obras estéticas e inspiradoras, como modificar de forma simples e rápida partes de imagens e otimizar seus resultados. Também estudaremos técnicas avançadas que permitirão, por exemplo, criar uma continuidade na geração de um personagem de ficção ou quadrinhos, para resultados ainda mais impressionantes.

Soluções para as Limitações do ChatGPT e da IA

ChatGPT e outros modelos de inteligência artificial apresentam limitações e fraquezas. Nesta seção, veremos quais são essas limitações e como superá-las.

Funcionalidades Interessantes do ChatGPT

Aprenda a configurar as funcionalidades de compartilhamento de suas conversas para uma utilização colaborativa do ChatGPT. Aproveite ao máximo o aplicativo móvel do ChatGPT, explorando todas as opções que ele oferece. Por fim, descubra métodos para criar conteúdo único com a IA, evitando qualquer forma de plágio ou conteúdo duplicado.

Copilot e Bing

O Copilot oferece várias alternativas interessantes para funcionalidades pagas e avançadas do ChatGPT. Veremos como aproveitar a parceria entre a Microsoft e a OpenAI para acessar funcionalidades avançadas de inteligência artificial integradas ao motor de busca Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral e Outros

Dando continuidade à seção anterior, estudaremos outras IAs, como o Gemini do Google e o Claude da Anthropic. Veremos suas forças, fraquezas e analisaremos vários casos de uso para saber em quais situações preferi-las ao ChatGPT.

Custom Instructions no ChatGPT

Adapte o ChatGPT às suas necessidades e expectativas. Aprenda a personalizar suas interações configurando suas custom instructions. Descubra também os pontos de atenção para uma utilização ótima.

Os GPTs

Descubra como funcionam os GPTs, essas miniaplicações hiperespecializadas que podem, às vezes, superar o ChatGPT. Aprenda a criar seu próprio GPT passo a passo. Domine as chamadas de API para maximizar as capacidades do ChatGPT e, ao final da seção, descubra como monetizar seus GPTs e, mais amplamente, como ganhar dinheiro com o ChatGPT.

Gestão de API & Playground

Explore o playground do ChatGPT e descubra as novas funcionalidades que ele oferece. Aprenda a chamar a API do ChatGPT com níveis crescentes de dificuldade. Assim, você poderá usar o ChatGPT fora da interface, criar um chatbot em outro site ou até mesmo integrar o ChatGPT a outros softwares, como Google Sheets ou Excel, por exemplo.
targetAudiences: Qualquer pessoa que deseje dominar a IA e o ChatGPT. Esta formação é adequada para todos os níveis.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Unlock the secrets to successful cold calling and transform your sales game with our comprehensive course, "Cold Calling Guide: How to Be Confident While Cold Calling." Whether you're a seasoned sales professional looking to sharpen your skills, an aspiring entrepreneur eager to make connections, or a career changer aiming to break into the competitive world of sales, this course is designed to equip you with the skills and confidence you need to thrive in cold calling.


In today’s fast-paced business environment, the ability to initiate meaningful conversations with potential clients is more crucial than ever. Cold calling can often be viewed as daunting, but with the right techniques and mindset, it can become one of your most powerful tools for generating leads and closing deals. Throughout this course, you will discover proven strategies that empower you to overcome fear and anxiety, allowing you to approach each call with enthusiasm and assurance.


We begin by delving into the foundational principles of cold calling. You’ll learn the essential elements of crafting compelling scripts that not only grab attention but also engage prospects in meaningful dialogue. You'll understand the importance of personalizing your approach to cater to different audiences, ensuring your message resonates with their specific needs and pain points.


Effective questioning is at the heart of successful cold calling. In this course, you will master the art of crafting open-ended and probing questions that encourage prospects to share valuable insights about their challenges. By understanding their needs, you'll be better positioned to offer tailored solutions that demonstrate your value and increase the likelihood of conversion.


Another critical aspect of cold calling that we cover is recognizing and responding to buying signals. You’ll learn how to identify verbal and non-verbal cues that indicate a prospect's interest, enabling you to transition seamlessly into the closing phase. Armed with this knowledge, you’ll feel more confident in asking for a commitment and guiding the conversation toward a successful outcome.


Building rapport is essential in any sales interaction, and this course will teach you how to establish instant connections with prospects. You’ll explore techniques for finding common ground, using active listening skills, and responding with empathy. These interpersonal skills will not only enhance your ability to engage with clients but also foster trust, making prospects more receptive to your offerings.


Rejection is an inevitable part of the cold calling process, but it doesn’t have to derail your confidence. You’ll learn effective strategies for accepting rejection, reframing it as a learning opportunity, and developing resilience that keeps you motivated. Our course emphasizes the importance of a growth mindset, encouraging you to view each call as a chance for improvement and growth, regardless of the outcome.


As part of your learning journey, you will engage in practical exercises, including role-playing scenarios that simulate real-life interactions. This hands-on approach will allow you to practice your skills in a safe environment, gaining valuable experience that translates to real-world success.


By the end of this course, you will emerge as a confident cold caller, equipped with the knowledge and skills to initiate conversations, handle objections gracefully, and convert leads into loyal customers. You'll join a community of like-minded learners who share your commitment to personal and professional growth, providing networking opportunities that extend beyond the course.


Don't let fear hold you back from achieving your sales goals. Invest in your future success today and take the first step toward mastering the art of cold calling. Enroll now and start your journey to becoming a confident, successful cold caller, ready to make an impact in the world of sales!

What is Product Management?

Product Management is a multifaceted discipline that encompasses the planning, development, marketing, and optimization of a product or service throughout its lifecycle. It involves aligning customer needs with business goals and coordinating cross-functional teams to deliver successful and valuable products. Product managers act as the linchpin between various departments, ensuring seamless communication and collaboration.


Why is Learning Product Management Important for Companies and Experts?

  1. Market Relevance and Competitiveness:

    • In an era of rapid technological advancements and evolving consumer preferences, companies must stay relevant. Product management equips professionals with the skills to identify market trends, understand customer needs, and develop products that outpace competitors

  2. Customer-Centric Approach:

    • Successful products are those that solve real problems for customers. Product management emphasizes a customer-centric approach, ensuring that the product aligns with user needs and expectations. This focus enhances customer satisfaction and loyalty

  3. Optimized Resource Allocation:

    • Product managers are adept at prioritizing features and functionalities based on business goals and customer needs. This strategic allocation of resources ensures that the most critical aspects of a product are addressed, maximizing the impact of limited resources

  4. Effective Communication and Collaboration:

    • Product managers act as bridges between various departments, fostering effective communication and collaboration. This ensures that development, marketing, sales, and other teams work cohesively toward a common goal, reducing silos and enhancing overall efficiency

  5. Adaptability and Innovation:

    • The product management discipline encourages a mindset of continuous improvement and innovation. Professionals in this field are equipped to adapt to changing market conditions, incorporate feedback, and drive iterative development, fostering a culture of innovation within the organization

How Knowledge of Product Management Aids Career Development:

  1. Cross-Functional Skillset:

    • Product management requires a diverse skill set that includes market research, strategic planning, communication, and project management. Professionals with expertise in these areas are highly sought after, making product management a versatile career path

  2. Leadership Opportunities:

    • Product managers often take on leadership roles, overseeing teams and guiding product development strategies. The ability to lead cross-functional teams and drive product success positions individuals for advancement in their careers

  3. Entrepreneurial Mindset:

    • Product managers are often viewed as the "CEOs of their products." Learning product management instills an entrepreneurial mindset, empowering individuals to take ownership of their projects and make strategic decisions that impact the success of the product

  4. Global Perspective:

    • As products have a global reach, product managers gain exposure to international markets and diverse customer bases. This global perspective enhances their ability to navigate the complexities of the modern business landscape

Product management is a critical discipline for companies aiming to thrive in today's dynamic markets. For professionals, mastering product management opens doors to leadership roles, cultivates an entrepreneurial mindset, and provides a comprehensive skill set that is invaluable in the ever-evolving business landscape.

Lesson 7: Launch Planning and Execution

  • Setting clear launch objectives and timelines

Lesson 8: Customer Acquisition and Retention

  • Identifying and targeting high-value customers

Lesson 9: Metrics and Analytics for GTM Success

  • Key performance indicators (KPIs) for GTM strategies

courseDetails.title: Modelowanie finansowe: Kompletny kurs finansów w Excelu
courseDetails.shortDescription: Praktyczny przypadek modelowania finansowego w Excel - Finanse, wycena i modelowanie finansowe
courseDetails.longDescription:
Jeśli interesujesz się karierą w finansach, taką jak Private Equity, fuzje i przejęcia (M&A), kontrola finansowa lub zarządzanie finansami, musisz zdawać sobie sprawę, że istnieje kluczowa umiejętność, którą trzeba opanować we wszystkich tych dziedzinach: modelowanie finansowe.

Nie ważne, czy tworzysz biznesplan, raport finansowy, czy dokonujesz wyceny firmy, ta umiejętność będzie niezbędna.

Ten kompleksowy kurs modelowania finansowego w Excelu dostarczy ci wiedzy, kodów i najlepszych praktyk, pozwalając na stworzenie przejrzystego, dobrze ustrukturyzowanego modelu w Excelu, który spełni oczekiwania banków inwestycyjnych, funduszy Private Equity i zespołów zarządzania finansami.

W trakcie tego szkolenia nauczysz się standardów modelowania finansowego i zasad, które należy przestrzegać, aby osiągnąć profesjonalne rezultaty.

Nauczysz się projektować kompleksowy model finansowy, obejmujący wiele scenariuszy inwestycyjnych, harmonogram długu z różnymi transzami finansowania i charakterystykami, przejrzystą tabelę źródeł i zastosowań środków, profesjonalny biznesplan oraz model wyceny firmy oparty na porównywalnych transakcjach, wykorzystując normatywną wartość EBITDA. Na zakończenie obliczymy IRR i przeprowadzimy jego analizę wrażliwości zgodnie z parametrami wyjścia z inwestycji.

Jeśli nie znasz jeszcze wszystkich tych pojęć, przedstawimy ich znaczenie przed rozpoczęciem modelowania finansowego w Excelu.

Kurs ten obejmuje podstawy finansów, które są niezbędne do opanowania, jeśli interesujesz się kontrolą finansową, analizą finansową lub karierą w sektorze transakcji (Private Equity, M&A, LBO, Transaction Services).
targetAudiences: Studenci finansów zainteresowani wysoce konkurencyjnymi obszarami finansów korporacyjnych, takimi jak Private Equity, Venture Capital, M&A, Leveraged Finance, ECM, Transaction Services, Restructuring, Valuation oraz oczywiście modelowanie finansowe.
Kandydaci do rozmowy kwalifikacyjnej w dziedzinie finansów, którzy chcą ćwiczyć i przygotować się do przypadków modelowania finansowego w Excel.
Stażystowie w dziedzinie finansów korporacyjnych, którzy chcą doskonalić swoje umiejętności finansowe, modelowania finansowego oraz obsługi Excela.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT & KI: Die ultimative künstliche intelligenz-schulung
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master KI und Prompt-Engineering: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Copilot, Gemini – Der umfassende Leitfaden zur generativen KI
courseDetails.longDescription:
Sind Sie bereit, jeden Tag mit einem außergewöhnlich talentierten persönlichen Assistenten zu beginnen, der Ihre Aufgaben mit unübertroffener Präzision und Geschwindigkeit erledigt? Eine KI, die Ihre E-Mails, Artikel oder Berichte verfasst, inspirierende Bilder erstellt, komplexe Daten analysiert, maßgeschneiderte Lösungen programmiert und eine Vielzahl von Problemen löst, sodass Sie sich auf das Wesentliche konzentrieren können.

Um all diese Vorteile der KI voll auszuschöpfen, müssen Sie jedoch lernen, sie richtig zu beherrschen. Viele Menschen sind anfangs begeistert, erstellen ein paar Eingabeaufforderungen und verlieren dann das Interesse, ohne das wahre Potenzial der künstlichen Intelligenz zu entdecken. Oft liegt dies an fehlenden Kenntnissen über die Techniken, Methoden und Einstellungen, die erforderlich sind, um optimale Ergebnisse mit der KI zu erzielen.

Ziel dieser Schulung ist es, Ihnen die Werkzeuge an die Hand zu geben, um effektiv mit der KI zu kommunizieren, sie optimal zu konfigurieren und ihr volles Potenzial auszuschöpfen.

Dazu habe ich einen prägnanten und dynamischen Kurs entwickelt, der Ihnen hilft, die wesentlichen Kenntnisse und Fähigkeiten für die optimale Nutzung der KI zu erwerben.

Im Verlauf dieser Schulung werden wir gemeinsam behandeln:

  • Wie Sie klare Anfragen an die KI formulieren, um die bestmöglichen Antworten zu erhalten.

  • Wie Sie ChatGPT so konfigurieren, dass es zu Ihrem Lehrer, Mitgründer oder vertrauenswürdigen Analysten wird.

  • Wie Sie mehrere Ideen generieren und Ihre Arbeit produktiver, schneller, relevanter und effizienter gestalten.

  • Wie Sie die Multimodalität von ChatGPT voll ausschöpfen, indem Sie ihm schreiben, mit ihm sprechen, ihm zuhören, ihm Bilder übermitteln und ihn bitten, diese zu interpretieren.

  • Wie Sie Dall-e oder Copilot dazu bringen, die besten Bilder zu erzeugen.

  • Wie Sie interessante Alternativen zur kostenpflichtigen Version von ChatGPT finden.

  • Wir werden auch andere KIs wie Copilot, Claude oder Gemini erkunden.

  • Wie Sie ChatGPT an Ihre spezifischen Vorlieben und Bedürfnisse anpassen können, um maßgeschneiderte Antworten zu erhalten.

  • Wie Sie ChatGPT mit GPTs erweitern können: wie man diese Anwendungen nutzt und sogar erstellt, ohne Entwickler zu sein.

  • Gegen Ende der Schulung werden wir einige technischere Themen behandeln, wie die Verwaltung von APIs, den Playground und die Integration von ChatGPT in andere Software wie Excel oder Google Sheets.

Und vor allem werden wir sehen, dass all dies für jedermann zugänglich ist, selbst für Anfänger.

In dieser Schulung finden Sie:

  • Konkrete Demonstrationen.

  • Technische Datenblätter und herunterladbare praktische Anleitungen.

[Aktualisierung: Ich habe Videos zur Nutzung des Modells GPT-4o hinzugefügt, das die Nachfolge von GPT-4 antritt.]

Kurz gesagt: Sie stehen kurz davor, an einem klar strukturierten, zugänglichen und ansprechenden Kurs teilzunehmen. Dieser Kurs bietet genügend Details, um die wesentlichen Konzepte abzudecken, ohne sich in unnötigen Längen zu verlieren. Unabhängig von Ihrem Einstiegsniveau, ob Sie Anfänger sind oder bereits fortgeschrittene Techniken suchen, dies ist die einzige Schulung, die Sie benötigen, um ChatGPT zu meistern.

Über mich:

Mein Name ist Yassine Rochd, und ich bin Gründer eines Schulungsunternehmens, das bereits Tausenden von Lernenden geholfen hat, ihre beruflichen Ziele zu erreichen.

Ich bin auch leidenschaftlich an Technologie interessiert. Nach einem Master-Abschluss in Finanzwesen und Erfahrungen in der Beratung sowie im Investmentfondsbereich, habe ich eine Ausbildung im Web-Development absolviert und Hunderte von Stunden damit verbracht, KI zu entdecken und zu nutzen.

Heute möchte ich Ihnen auf möglichst verständliche Weise das Wissen vermitteln, das ich in den letzten Jahren gesammelt habe.

Zertifizierung und Garantie:

Nach Abschluss dieses Kurses erhalten Sie ein Zertifikat, das Sie sogar auf LinkedIn teilen können.
Dieser Kurs ist zudem risikofrei, denn Sie haben eine 30-tägige „Zufriedenheitsgarantie“ mit Geld-zurück-Option.
Sie erhalten lebenslangen Zugang zum Kurs und zu den herunterladbaren Ressourcen.
Sie sind nur einen Klick davon entfernt, eine äußerst nützliche Technologie zu beherrschen, die Sie effizienter, produktiver und unverzichtbar macht.

Details zu den verschiedenen Kursabschnitten:

Schnelle Einführung in ChatGPT
Lernen Sie, wie Sie ChatGPT in nur wenigen Videos schnell beherrschen können. Tauchen Sie in die intuitive Benutzeroberfläche von ChatGPT ein und lernen Sie, Ihre ersten Prompts zu erstellen, um die volle Leistungsfähigkeit der KI auszuschöpfen. Egal, ob Sie Tabellen erstellen, brainstormen, Ideen generieren, Texte übersetzen und korrigieren oder vielfältige Inhalte verfassen möchten – mit dieser KI werden Sie schneller und leistungsfähiger. Entdecken Sie, wie ChatGPT Sie bei Ihrer Jobsuche unterstützen kann und sich an Ihre beruflichen Bedürfnisse anpasst, um Ihre Effizienz zu steigern. Sie werden sehen, dass ChatGPT in der Lage ist, eine Vielzahl von Inhalten zu erstellen, von E-Mails und Briefen bis hin zu Artikeln und Posts für soziale Netzwerke, ganz zu schweigen von der Erstellung von Programmiercode.

Grundlagen des Prompt Engineering
Erfahren Sie, warum das Prompt Engineering entscheidend ist und wie es ChatGPT in einen echten Experten verwandeln kann. Verstehen Sie die Bedeutung von Kontext und Zielen, um Ihre Interaktionen zu strukturieren, und lernen Sie, wie Sie das Format und die Parameter anpassen, um Ihre Prompts zu optimieren und das Kreativitätsniveau des Modells zu steuern. Personalisieren Sie Ihre Interaktionen, indem Sie den Ton und Stil beherrschen, und profitieren Sie von fünf praktischen Tipps, um noch relevantere Antworten von ChatGPT zu erhalten.
targetAudiences: Dieser Kurs richtet sich an alle, die KI und ChatGPT meistern möchten. Diese Schulung ist für jedes Niveau geeignet.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT e IA Generativa: guía de IA y prompt engineering
courseDetails.shortDescription: Domina la IA y el Prompt engineering: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Copilot, Gemini | El curso esencial de IA generativa
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formación Integral en ChatGPT e IA Generativa

¿Te imaginas empezar cada día con un asistente personal sumamente talentoso, listo para ejecutar tus tareas con una precisión y rapidez insuperables?

Una IA que puede redactar tus correos, artículos o informes, crear imágenes inspiradoras, analizar datos complejos, programar soluciones a medida y resolver innumerables problemas, permitiéndote enfocarte en lo que realmente importa.

Para disfrutar de todos estos beneficios, primero hay que dominar la IA. Muchas personas se entusiasman, realizan un par de comandos y abandonan, sin llegar a descubrir el verdadero potencial de la inteligencia artificial. Este comportamiento suele deberse a la falta de conocimiento sobre las técnicas, métodos y configuraciones que permiten obtener los mejores resultados.

El objetivo de esta formación es proporcionarte todas las herramientas para comunicarte eficazmente con la IA, configurarla de la mejor manera y explotarla al máximo. Para lograrlo, he diseñado un curso conciso y dinámico que te permitirá desarrollar los conocimientos y habilidades esenciales para un uso óptimo de la IA.


Durante esta formación, aprenderás:

  • Formulación de solicitudes claras a la IA: Cómo redactar peticiones precisas para obtener las mejores respuestas posibles.

  • Configuración de ChatGPT: Convertir ChatGPT en tu profesor, cofundador o analista de confianza.

  • Generación de ideas y productividad: Técnicas para generar múltiples ideas y mejorar tu trabajo, aumentando tu productividad, velocidad, relevancia y eficacia.

  • Aprovechamiento de la multimodalidad de ChatGPT: Cómo escribirle, hablarle, escucharlo, enviarle imágenes y pedirle que las interprete.

  • Generación de imágenes con Dall-e y Copilot: Estrategias para obtener las mejores imágenes posibles.

  • Alternativas a la versión de pago de ChatGPT: Cómo encontrar y utilizar opciones interesantes.

  • Exploración de otras IA: Conocer y utilizar otras herramientas como Copilot, Claude o Gemini.

  • Adaptación de ChatGPT a tus necesidades: Personalizar ChatGPT según tus preferencias y necesidades específicas para obtener respuestas a medida.

  • Potenciación de ChatGPT con los GPTs: Uso de aplicaciones GPT y creación de estas, incluso sin ser desarrollador.

  • Temas técnicos avanzados: Gestión de API, uso del playground, e integración de ChatGPT en otros software como Excel o Google Sheets.

  • Accesibilidad para todos: Todo el contenido está diseñado para ser accesible, incluso para principiantes.


En esta formación, encontrarás:

  • Demostraciones concretas: Ejemplos prácticos y casos de uso.

  • Fichas técnicas y guías prácticas: Material descargable para facilitar tu aprendizaje.

[Actualización: He añadido videos sobre el uso del modelo GPT4o que sucede a la versión GPT4]

En resumen, estás a punto de iniciar un curso claro, accesible y atractivo. Está diseñado para cubrir los conceptos esenciales sin extenderse demasiado, ofreciendo el equilibrio perfecto. No importa tu nivel inicial, ya seas principiante o busques técnicas avanzadas, esta es la única formación que necesitarás para dominar ChatGPT.


Mi presentación:

Me llamo Yassine, soy el fundador de una organización de formación que ha ayudado a miles de estudiantes a alcanzar sus objetivos profesionales. Soy un apasionado de la tecnología. Después de obtener un máster en finanzas y adquirir experiencia en consultoría y fondos de inversión, me formé en desarrollo web y dediqué cientos de horas a descubrir y utilizar IA. Hoy quiero transmitirte, de la manera más clara posible, todo lo que he aprendido en estos últimos años.


Certificación y garantía:

  • Al completar esta formación, recibirás una certificación que podrás compartir en LinkedIn.

  • Esta formación es sin riesgo, ya que cuentas con una garantía de "satisfacción o reembolso" de 30 días.

  • Tendrás acceso de por vida a la formación y a los recursos descargables.

Estás a un clic de dominar una tecnología extremadamente útil que te hará más eficiente, más productivo y, simplemente, indispensable. ¡Inscríbete ahora y comienza tu viaje hacia la maestría en IA!



Detalle de las diferentes secciones de este curso:


Introducción rápida a ChatGPT

Descubre cómo dominar rápidamente ChatGPT en solo unos pocos videos. Sumérgete en su interfaz intuitiva y aprende a crear tus primeros comandos para aprovechar al máximo el poder de la IA. Ya sea para generar tablas, hacer lluvias de ideas, generar nuevas ideas, traducir y corregir textos, o redactar diversos contenidos, serás más rápido y eficiente con la IA. Descubre cómo ChatGPT puede asistirte en tu búsqueda de empleo y adaptarse a tus necesidades profesionales para aumentar tu eficacia. Verás que ChatGPT es capaz de crear una multitud de contenidos, desde correos y cartas hasta artículos y publicaciones para redes sociales, sin olvidar la redacción de código informático.

Fundamentos del prompt engineering

Aprende por qué el prompt engineering es esencial y cómo puede transformar a ChatGPT en un verdadero experto. Comprende la importancia del contexto y los objetivos para estructurar tus interacciones, y descubre cómo ajustar el formato y la temperatura para optimizar tus comandos y variar el nivel de creatividad del modelo. Personaliza tus interacciones dominando el tono y el estilo, y benefíciate de 5 consejos prácticos para obtener respuestas aún más pertinentes de ChatGPT.

Técnicas avanzadas de prompt engineering

En esta sección, veremos cómo crear comandos que generen otros comandos. Estudiaremos la metodología de reverse engineering, las funcionalidades de búsqueda web, la interpretación de imágenes y muchas otras técnicas avanzadas.

Dall-e

Continuaremos con la generación de imágenes con Dall-e. Verás cómo pasar de un resultado promedio a obras estéticas e inspiradoras, cómo modificar de manera simple y rápida porciones de imágenes y optimizar tus resultados. También estudiaremos técnicas avanzadas que te permitirán, por ejemplo, crear una continuidad en la generación de un personaje de ficción o cómic, para obtener resultados aún más impresionantes.

Soluciones a las limitaciones de ChatGPT y la IA

ChatGPT y otros modelos de inteligencia artificial tienen límites y debilidades. En esta sección, exploraremos cuáles son y cómo superarlas.

Funcionalidades interesantes en ChatGPT

Aprende a configurar las funcionalidades de compartir tus conversaciones para un uso colaborativo de ChatGPT. Aprovecha al máximo la aplicación móvil de ChatGPT explorando todas las opciones que ofrece. Finalmente, descubre métodos para crear contenido único con la IA evitando cualquier forma de plagio o contenido duplicado.

Copilot y Bing

Copilot ofrece varias alternativas interesantes a las funcionalidades avanzadas y de pago de ChatGPT. Veremos cómo aprovechar la colaboración entre Microsoft y OpenAI para acceder a funcionalidades avanzadas de inteligencia artificial integradas en el motor de búsqueda Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral y otros

En la continuidad de la sección anterior, estudiaremos otras IA como Gemini de Google o Claude de Anthropic. Veremos sus fortalezas, debilidades y analizaremos varios casos de uso para saber en qué situaciones es preferible utilizarlas en lugar de ChatGPT.

Instrucciones personalizadas en ChatGPT

Adapta ChatGPT a tus necesidades y expectativas. Aprende a personalizar tus interacciones configurando tus instrucciones personalizadas. Descubre también los puntos de precaución a considerar para un uso óptimo.

Los GPTs

Descubre el funcionamiento de los GPTs, esas mini aplicaciones hiperespecializadas que a veces pueden superar a ChatGPT. Aprende a crear tu propio GPT paso a paso. Domina las llamadas a la API para maximizar las capacidades de ChatGPT y descubre al final de esta sección cómo monetizar tus GPTs y, en general, cómo ganar dinero gracias a ChatGPT.

Gestión de API y Playground

Explora el playground de ChatGPT y descubre las nuevas funcionalidades que ofrece. Aprende a hacer llamadas a la API de ChatGPT con niveles de dificultad crecientes. Así, podrás utilizar ChatGPT fuera de la interfaz, crear un chatbot en otro sitio o incluso integrar ChatGPT en otros software como Google Sheets o Excel, por ejemplo.
targetAudiences: A cualquier persona que desee dominar la IA y ChatGPT. Esta formación es para todos los niveles.

This course isn't for beginners; it's for those with a basic understanding of word problem concepts.

We address these "grey areas" by providing 165 meticulously solved questions across four sections, covering percentages, ratios & proportions, averages, probability, geometry, rates, and IQ & logical-type questions.

  4. Shortcut Mastery: Most questions in this course are solved using clever shortcut techniques, while some are explained through both shortcuts and conventional methods. Understanding the logic behind shortcuts boosts your confidence on test day, even if you choose not to use them.

  5. A Journey of Growth: Our journey is just beginning! We're committed to expanding this course into a 50+ hour treasure trove with over 1000 GRE and GMAT level questions.

This course is tailor-made for advanced-level students, featuring GRE content at the 320+ level and GMAT content at the 700+ level. It's your bridge to the score you've been aiming for.

courseDetails.title: Forex Trading Guide: Master Forex Trading Skills
courseDetails.shortDescription: Unlock the Secrets of Successful Forex Trading: Master Strategies, Risk Management, and Technical Analysis
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to "Mastering Forex Trading: From Basics to Advanced Strategies," your comprehensive guide to navigating the exciting and dynamic world of currency trading! Whether you're a complete beginner eager to explore the forex market or an intermediate trader looking to refine your skills and strategies, this course is designed to equip you with the knowledge and tools necessary for success in forex trading.


In this course, you'll embark on a journey to understand the fundamental principles of forex trading. We start with the essentials, introducing key terminology, market structure, and the various types of currency pairs. You'll learn how to differentiate between major, minor, and exotic pairs and grasp the mechanics behind forex trading.


One of the cornerstones of this course is mastering technical analysis. You'll discover how to analyze price movements using essential tools and indicators such as moving averages, Bollinger Bands, and the Relative Strength Index (RSI). We’ll delve into the intricacies of reading forex charts, including line, bar, and candlestick charts, empowering you to make informed trading decisions based on market trends and patterns.


We understand that forex trading is not just about numbers; it’s also about understanding the market environment. This course will introduce you to fundamental analysis, where you'll learn how economic indicators, such as GDP, inflation rates, and employment figures, impact currency values. You'll also explore how geopolitical events and central bank policies shape market sentiment, allowing you to anticipate potential price movements effectively.


But that's not all! This course goes beyond theory; you'll learn proven trading strategies tailored for different trading styles. Whether you prefer the fast-paced action of scalping, the strategic approach of day trading, or the long-term vision of swing and position trading, we have you covered. Each strategy is presented with clear, actionable steps and real-world examples, ensuring you can implement them in your trading.


Risk management is crucial in forex trading, and this course emphasizes techniques to help protect your capital. You'll learn how to calculate position sizes, set stop-loss and take-profit orders, and utilize leverage wisely. Our approach ensures that you can navigate the markets with confidence, minimizing risks while maximizing potential rewards.


Furthermore, we delve into the psychological aspects of trading, which are often overlooked yet vital for success. You'll gain valuable insights into managing emotions, maintaining discipline, and cultivating the patience required for effective trading. Understanding trading psychology will help you avoid common pitfalls, enabling you to make rational decisions even in the face of market volatility.


By the end of this course, you will not only have a solid understanding of forex trading but also the confidence to implement your own trading strategies. You'll have the skills necessary to analyze the market, adapt to changing conditions, and refine your approach based on performance.


Join our community of aspiring traders and take the first step towards financial independence through forex trading. Our engaging content, supportive community, and comprehensive resources will guide you every step of the way. Enroll today and start your journey towards mastering forex trading!
targetAudiences: Beginner Traders: Individuals who are new to forex trading and have little to no experience in the financial markets. This group seeks to gain foundational knowledge about currency trading, understand basic concepts, and develop the skills necessary to start trading confidently

Aspiring Investors: Individuals looking to diversify their investment portfolios by including forex trading. This group may have some experience with other investment vehicles (like stocks or mutual funds) and is interested in learning about the unique aspects of forex trading, including risk management and technical analysis

Intermediate Traders: Those who have basic knowledge of forex trading and have engaged in some trading but wish to enhance their skills and strategies. This group seeks to deepen their understanding of technical and fundamental analysis, refine their trading strategies, and improve their overall trading performance through advanced techniques and psychological insights

courseDetails.title: Modelización financiera: curso completo de finanzas en Excel
courseDetails.shortDescription: Caso práctico de modelización financiera en Excel – Business Plan, valoración y modelización financiera
courseDetails.longDescription:
Si está interesado en carreras financieras como Private Equity, Venture Capital, M&A, controlling o gestión financiera, es posible que ya se haya dado cuenta de que existe una habilidad clave que es esencial para cada uno de estos trabajos. Se trata de la modelización financiera.

Ya sea esté elaborando un Business Plan, evaluando una oportunidad de inversión, creando un informe financiero o realizando la valoración de una empresa, la modelización financiera le será una habilidad esencial.

Este curso completo de modelización financiera en Excel le brindará los conocimientos, códigos y mejores prácticas necesarios para crear un modelo Excel claro y bien estructurado que cumpla con las expectativas de los bancos de inversión, los fondos de Private Equity y los equipos de gestión financiera.

En esta formación, usted aprenderá las normas y reglas de la modelización financiera que se deben seguir para obtener resultados profesionales.

Aprenderá a diseñar un modelo financiero completo con múltiples escenarios de inversión, un calendario de deuda con diferentes tramos de financiamiento y características variables, una tabla clara de Fuentes y Usos, un Plan de Negocio profesional y un modelo de valoración de la empresa basado en transacciones comparables utilizando un EBITDA normativo. Por último, calcularemos la TIR y realizaremos un análisis de sensibilidad en función de los parámetros de salida de la inversión.

Por supuesto, si aún no está familiarizado con todos estos conceptos, repasaremos su significado antes de comenzar con la modelización financiera en Excel.

Para concluir, este curso cubre fundamentos esenciales en finanzas que es necesario dominar si está interesado en el control financiero, el análisis financiero o carreras transaccionales (Private Equity, M&A, Transaction Services).
targetAudiences: Estudiantes de finanzas interesados en áreas altamente competitivas como Private Equity, Venture Capital, M&A, Leveraged Finance, ECM, Transaction Services, Restructuring, Valoración y, por supuesto, modelización financiera
Personas que se estén preparando para una entrevista en el ámbito financiero y deseen practicar y prepararse con casos de modelización financiera basados en Excel
Becarios de finanzas corporativas que deseen mejorar sus conocimientos en finanzas, modelización financiera y Excel
Analistas en finanzas corporativas
Profesionales financieros que deseen mejorar sus conocimientos en modelización financiera con Excel

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT & IA : Formation complète ChatGPT, Dall-e
courseDetails.shortDescription: Maîtrisez l'IA : ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude, Gemini | guide complet sur l’intelligence artificielle et les IA génératives
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formation complète ChatGPT & IA génératives :


Etes-vous prêt à démarrer chaque journée avec un allié, un assistant personnel extrêmement doué, prêt à accomplir vos tâches avec une précision et une rapidité inégalée. Une IA capable de rédiger vos mails, articles ou rapports, de créer des images inspirantes, d'analyser des données complexes, de coder des solutions sur mesure et de résoudre une multitude de problèmes, vous permettant ainsi de vous concentrer sur ce qui compte vraiment.


Pour tirer tous ces bénéfices de l’IA encore faut-il la maîtriser. Beaucoup de personnes s’enthousiasment, réalisent 2 ou 3 prompts et finissent par abandonner le sujet sans découvrir le vrai potentiel de l’intelligence artificielle. Derrière ce comportement se cache souvent une méconnaissance des techniques, méthodes, paramétrages qui permettent d’obtenir les meilleurs résultats avec l’intelligence artificielle.


Le but de cette formation c’est donc de vous donner toutes les clés pour communiquer efficacement avec l’IA, la paramétrer au mieux et l’exploiter pleinement.


Et pour y parvenir, j’ai conçu un parcours concis et dynamique qui vous permettra de développer les connaissances et compétences essentielles à l’utilisation optimisée de l’IA.

Au cours de cette formation, nous verrons ensemble :

- Comment formuler des requêtes claires à l’IA pour obtenir les meilleures réponses possibles

- Comment configurer ChatGPT pour qu'il devienne votre professeur, co-fondateur ou analyste de confiance.

- Comment générer de multiples idées et devenir meilleur dans votre travail, plus productif, plus rapide, plus pertinent et efficace.

- Comment profiter pleinement de la multimodalité de ChatGPT pour lui écrire, lui parler, l’écouter, lui transmettre des images et lui demander de les interpréter.

- Comment pousser Dall-e ou Copilot à générer les meilleures images possibles.

- Comment trouver des alternatives intéressantes à la version payante de ChatGPT.

- On va également explorer d’autres IA comme Copilot, Claude ou Gemini.

- On verra comment adapter ChatGPT à vos préférences et besoins spécifiques pour des réponses sur mesure.

- On va voir comment booster ChatGPT grâce aux GPTs : comment utiliser ces applications et même comment les créer sans être développeur.

- On va aussi explorer des sujets un peu plus techniques en fin de formation comme la gestion des API, le playground, l’intégration de ChatGPT sur d’autres logiciels comme Excel ou Google sheets par exemple.

- Et surtout on verra que tout ça est accessible à tous, même aux débutants.


Dans cette formation, vous trouverez :

  • Des démonstrations concrètes.

  • Des fiches techniques et guides pratiques téléchargeables.

  • Et surtout un contenu régulièrement mis à jour


En bref, vous vous apprêtez à suivre un cours clair, accessible et engageant. Assez détaillé pour couvrir les notions essentielles sans traîner en longueur. Peu importe votre niveau de départ que vous soyez débutant ou à la recherche de techniques avancées, c’est la seule formation dont vous aurez besoin pour maîtriser ChatGPT.


Qui suis-je ?

Je m’appelle Yassine Rochd, je suis le fondateur d’un organisme de formation qui a aidé des milliers d’apprenants à atteindre leurs objectifs professionnels.

Je suis également passionné par la technologie. Après un master en finance et des expériences en conseil et en fonds d’investissement, j'ai suivi une formation en développement web et passé des centaines d’heures à découvrir et utiliser des IA.

Aujourd’hui, je souhaite vous transmettre le plus clairement possible ce que j’ai appris ces dernières années.


Certification et garantie :

- En terminant cette formation, vous recevrez une certification que vous pourrez même partager sur LinkedIn.

- Cette formation est également sans risque puisque vous bénéficiez d’une garantie « satisfait ou remboursé » de 30 jours.

- Vous bénéficiez d’un accès à vie à la formation, aux ressources téléchargeables et aux futures mises à jour


Vous êtes à un clic de maîtriser une technologie extrêmement utile qui vous rendra plus efficace, plus productif, et tout simplement incontournable.



Détail des différentes sections de ce cours sur ChatGPT et l'IA :


I. Prise en main rapide de ChatGPT

Découvrez comment maîtriser rapidement ChatGPT en seulement quelques vidéos. Plongez dans l'interface intuitive de ChatGPT et apprenez à créer vos premiers prompts pour exploiter pleinement la puissance de l'IA. Que ce soit pour générer des tableaux, brainstormer, générer des idées, traduire et corriger des textes, ou encore rédiger des contenus variés, vous irez plus vite et serez plus performant avec l’IA. Découvrez comment ChatGPT peut vous assister dans votre recherche d'emploi et s'adapter à vos besoins professionnels pour accroître votre efficacité. Vous verrez que ChatGPT est capable de créer une multitude de contenus, allant des mails et lettres aux articles et posts pour les réseaux sociaux, sans oublier la rédaction de code informatique.


II. Les bases du prompt engineering

Apprenez pourquoi le prompt engineering est essentiel et comment il peut transformer ChatGPT en véritable expert. Comprenez l'importance du contexte et des objectifs pour structurer vos interactions, et découvrez comment ajuster le format et la température pour optimiser vos prompts et varier le niveau de créativité du modèle. Personnalisez vos interactions en maîtrisant le ton et le style, et bénéficiez de 5 conseils pratiques pour obtenir des réponses encore plus pertinentes de ChatGPT.

III. techniques avancées de prompt engineering

Dans cette section, on verra comment créer des prompts qui génèrent eux-mêmes d'autres prompts. On étudiera la méthode du reverse engineering, les fonctionnalités de recherche web, d’interprétation d’images et encore plein d’autres techniques avancées.


IV. Dall-e

On enchainera sur la génération d’images avec Dall-e. Vous verrez comment passer d’un résultat très moyen à des œuvres esthétiques et inspirantes, comment modifier simplement et rapidement des portions d'images et optimiser vos résultats. On étudiera également des techniques avancées qui vous permettront par exemple de créer une continuité dans la génération d’un personnage de fiction ou de bande dessinée, pour des résultats encore plus impressionnants.


V. Les solutions aux limites de ChatGPT et de l’IA

ChatGPT et les autres modèles d’intelligence artificielle présentent des limites et des faiblesses. On verra dans cette section quelles sont-elles et comment les surmonter.


VI. Fonctionnalités intéressantes sur ChatGPT

Apprenez à paramétrer les fonctionnalités de partage de vos conversations pour une utilisation collaborative de ChatGPT. Exploitez au mieux l’application mobile Chat GPT, en explorant toutes les options qu'elle offre. Enfin, découvrez les méthodes pour créer un contenu unique avec l’IA en évitant toute forme de plagiat ou contenu dupliqué.


VII. Copilot et Bing

Copilot propose plusieurs alternatives intéressantes à des fonctionnalités payantes et avancées de ChatGPT. On verra comment profiter du partenariat entre Microsoft et OpenAI pour accéder à des fonctionnalités avancées d’intelligence artificielle intégrées au moteur de recherche Bing.


VIII. Gemini, Claude, Mistral et les autres

Dans la continuité de la section précédente, on étudiera d’autres IA comme Gemini de Google ou Claude d’Anthropique. On verra leur force, leur faiblesse et on étudiera plusieurs cas d’utilisation pour savoir dans quel cas les préférer à ChatGPT.


IX. Custom Instructions ChatGPT

Adaptez ChatGPT à vos besoins et à vos attentes. Apprenez à personnaliser vos interactions en configurant vos custom instructions. Découvrez également les points de vigilance à considérer pour une utilisation optimale.


X. Les GPTs

Découvrez le fonctionnement des GPTs, ces mini applications hyperspécialisées qui peuvent parfois dépasser ChatGPT. Apprenez à créer votre propre GPT étape par étape. Maîtrisez les appels d’API pour maximiser les capacités de ChatGPT et découvrez même en fin de section comment monétiser vos GPTs et, plus largement, comment gagner de l'argent grâce à ChatGPT.


XI. Gestion d’API & Playground

Explorez le playground de ChatGPT et découvrez les nouvelles fonctionnalités qu'il offre. Apprenez à appeler l'API de ChatGPT avec des niveaux de difficulté croissants. Vous pourrez ainsi utiliser ChatGPT en dehors de l'interface, créer un chatbot sur un autre site ou même intégrer ChatGPT à d'autres logiciels comme Google Sheets ou Excel, par exemple.
targetAudiences: Toute personne souhaitant maîtriser l'IA et ChatGPT. Cette formation est tout niveau.

courseDetails.title: Modellazione finanziaria: corso completo di finanza su Excel
courseDetails.shortDescription: Studio di caso di modellazione finanziaria su Excel - Finanza, valutazione e modellazione finanziaria su Excel
courseDetails.longDescription:
Se siete interessati a carriere nel campo della finanza, come Private Equity, M&A, controllo finanziario o gestione finanziaria, avrete compreso che esiste un'abilità fondamentale da padroneggiare in tutti questi ambiti: la modellazione finanziaria.

Che stiate elaborando un business plan, un report finanziario, o conducendo una valutazione aziendale, questa competenza è indispensabile.

Questo corso completo sulla modellazione finanziaria in Excel vi doterà delle conoscenze, delle tecniche e delle migliori pratiche per sviluppare un modello su Excel chiaro e ben organizzato che risponda alle aspettative di banche d'investimento, fondi di Private Equity e squadre di gestione finanziaria.

Durante questa formazione, apprenderete gli standard di modellazione finanziaria e le regole da seguire per ottenere un esito professionale.

Imparerete a creare un modello finanziario dettagliato con vari scenari di investimento, un piano di indebitamento con diverse tranche di finanziamento e caratteristiche variabili, una chiara tabella di Fonti e Impieghi, un Business Plan professionale e un modello di valutazione aziendale basato su transazioni comparabili, impiegando un EBITDA normativo. Infine, calcoleremo il Tasso Interno di Ritorno (TIR) e lo adegueremo in base ai parametri di uscita dell'investimento.

Naturalmente, se non siete ancora a conoscenza di tutti questi concetti, ne chiariremo il significato prima di iniziare con la modellazione finanziaria su Excel.

Questo corso abbraccia i fondamenti essenziali della finanza, indispensabili da padroneggiare per chi è interessato al controllo finanziario, all'analisi finanziaria o alle carriere transazionali (PE, M&A, TS).
targetAudiences: Studenti di finanza interessati ai settori altamente competitivi della finanza aziendale come il Private Equity, il Venture Capital, M&A, il Leveraged Finance, l'ECM, i Transaction Services, la Ristrutturazione, la Valutazione e, naturalmente, la modellazione finanziaria.
Candidati per un colloquio in finanza che desiderano esercitarsi e prepararsi per casi di modellazione finanziaria basati su Excel.
Stagisti in finanza aziendale che vogliono migliorare le loro competenze in finanza, modellazione finanziaria ed Excel.
Analisti junior in finanza aziendale.
Analisti finanziari senior che desiderano migliorare le proprie competenze in modellazione finanziaria con Excel.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT e IA: Corso completo sull'IA generativa
courseDetails.shortDescription: Padroneggia l'IA: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude, Gemini - guida completa sull'intelligenza artificiale e le IA generative.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formazione Completa su ChatGPT e IA Generative:

Siete pronti a iniziare ogni giornata con un alleato, un assistente personale estremamente abile, capace di svolgere i vostri compiti con una precisione e una rapidità senza pari?

Un'IA capace di scrivere email, articoli o rapporti, di creare immagini ispiratrici, di analizzare dati complessi, di programmare soluzioni su misura e di risolvere una moltitudine di problemi, permettendovi così di concentrarvi su ciò che conta davvero.

Per ottenere tutti questi benefici dall'IA, è necessario padroneggiarla. Molte persone si entusiasmano, provano 2 o 3 prompt e finiscono per abbandonare il tema senza scoprire il vero potenziale dell'intelligenza artificiale. Questo comportamento spesso è dovuto a una mancanza di conoscenza delle tecniche, dei metodi e delle configurazioni che permettono di ottenere i migliori risultati con l'IA.

L'obiettivo di questa formazione è quindi di fornirvi tutte le chiavi per comunicare efficacemente con l'IA, configurarla al meglio e sfruttarla appieno.

Per raggiungere questo scopo, ho progettato un percorso conciso e dinamico che vi permetterà di sviluppare le conoscenze e le competenze essenziali per l'utilizzo ottimizzato dell'IA.


Durante questa formazione, vedremo insieme:

  • Come formulare richieste chiare all'IA per ottenere le migliori risposte possibili.

  • Come configurare ChatGPT affinché diventi il vostro professore, co-fondatore o analista di fiducia.

  • Come generare molteplici idee e migliorare nel vostro lavoro, diventando più produttivi, più veloci, più pertinenti ed efficienti.

  • Come sfruttare appieno la multimodalità di ChatGPT per scrivergli, parlargli, ascoltarlo, trasmettergli immagini e chiedergli di interpretarle.

  • Come spingere Dall-e o Copilot a generare le migliori immagini possibili.

  • Come trovare alternative interessanti alla versione a pagamento di ChatGPT.

  • Esploreremo anche altre IA come Copilot, Claude o Gemini.

  • Vedremo come adattare ChatGPT alle vostre preferenze e bisogni specifici per risposte su misura.

  • Vedremo come potenziare ChatGPT grazie ai GPT: come utilizzare queste applicazioni e persino come crearle senza essere sviluppatori.

  • Esploreremo anche argomenti più tecnici alla fine della formazione, come la gestione delle API, il playground, l'integrazione di ChatGPT su altri software come Excel o Google Sheets, per esempio.

  • E soprattutto vedremo che tutto questo è accessibile a tutti, anche ai principianti.


In questa formazione troverete:

  • Dimostrazioni concrete.

  • Schede tecniche e guide pratiche scaricabili.

[Aggiornamento: Ho aggiunto video sull'uso del modello GPT4o, successore della versione GPT4]

In breve, vi apprestate a seguire un corso chiaro, accessibile e coinvolgente. Abbastanza dettagliato da coprire i concetti essenziali senza essere troppo lungo. Indipendentemente dal vostro livello di partenza, che siate principianti o alla ricerca di tecniche avanzate, questa è l'unica formazione di cui avrete bisogno per padroneggiare ChatGPT.


La mia presentazione:

Mi chiamo Yassine Rochd, sono il fondatore di un ente di formazione che ha aiutato migliaia di studenti a raggiungere i loro obiettivi professionali.

Sono anche appassionato di tecnologia. Dopo una laurea magistrale in finanza e esperienze nella consulenza e nei fondi di investimento, ho seguito una formazione in sviluppo web e trascorso centinaia di ore a scoprire e utilizzare le IA.

Oggi desidero trasmettervi nel modo più chiaro possibile ciò che ho imparato in questi anni.


Certificazione e garanzia:

Completando questa formazione, riceverete una certificazione che potrete anche condividere su LinkedIn. Questa formazione è inoltre senza rischi, grazie alla garanzia "soddisfatti o rimborsati" di 30 giorni. Avrete accesso a vita alla formazione, alle risorse scaricabili e ai futuri aggiornamenti. Siete a un clic di distanza dal padroneggiare una tecnologia estremamente utile che vi renderà più efficienti, più produttivi e semplicemente indispensabili.


Dettaglio delle diverse sezioni di questo corso:

Introduzione rapida a ChatGPT
Scoprite come padroneggiare rapidamente ChatGPT con poche video lezioni. Esplorate l'interfaccia intuitiva di ChatGPT e imparate a creare i vostri primi prompt per sfruttare appieno la potenza dell'IA. Che si tratti di generare tabelle, fare brainstorming, creare idee, tradurre e correggere testi o redigere vari contenuti, diventerete più veloci e performanti con l'IA. Scoprite come ChatGPT può assistervi nella ricerca di lavoro e adattarsi alle vostre esigenze professionali per aumentare la vostra efficienza. Vedrete che ChatGPT è capace di creare una varietà di contenuti, dalle email e lettere agli articoli e post per i social media, senza dimenticare la scrittura di codice informatico.

Le basi del prompt engineering
Imparate perché il prompt engineering è essenziale e come può trasformare ChatGPT in un vero esperto. Capite l'importanza del contesto e degli obiettivi per strutturare le vostre interazioni e scoprite come regolare il formato e la temperatura per ottimizzare i vostri prompt e variare il livello di creatività del modello. Personalizzate le vostre interazioni padroneggiando il tono e lo stile, e beneficiate di cinque consigli pratici per ottenere risposte ancora più pertinenti da ChatGPT.

Tecniche avanzate di prompt engineering
In questa sezione, vedremo come creare prompt che generano altri prompt. Studieremo il metodo del reverse engineering, le funzionalità di ricerca web, l'interpretazione delle immagini e molte altre tecniche avanzate.

Dall-e
Passeremo alla generazione di immagini con Dall-e. Vedrete come passare da un risultato mediocre a opere estetiche e ispiratrici, come modificare semplicemente e rapidamente porzioni di immagini e ottimizzare i vostri risultati. Studieremo anche tecniche avanzate che vi permetteranno, per esempio, di creare una continuità nella generazione di un personaggio di finzione o di fumetti, per risultati ancora più impressionanti.

Le soluzioni ai limiti di ChatGPT e dell'IA
ChatGPT e altri modelli di intelligenza artificiale presentano dei limiti e delle debolezze. Vedremo in questa sezione quali sono e come superarle.

Funzionalità interessanti di ChatGPT
Imparate a configurare le funzionalità di condivisione delle vostre conversazioni per un utilizzo collaborativo di ChatGPT. Sfruttate al meglio l'applicazione mobile ChatGPT, esplorando tutte le opzioni che offre. Infine, scoprite i metodi per creare un contenuto unico con l'IA evitando qualsiasi forma di plagio o contenuto duplicato.

Copilot e Bing
Copilot propone diverse alternative interessanti a funzionalità avanzate e a pagamento di ChatGPT. Vedremo come sfruttare la collaborazione tra Microsoft e OpenAI per accedere a funzionalità avanzate di intelligenza artificiale integrate nel motore di ricerca Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral e altri
Nella continuità della sezione precedente, studieremo altre IA come Gemini di Google o Claude di Anthropic. Vedremo i loro punti di forza e di debolezza, e studieremo diversi casi d'uso per sapere quando preferirle a ChatGPT.

Istruzioni personalizzate di ChatGPT
Adattate ChatGPT alle vostre esigenze e aspettative. Imparate a personalizzare le vostre interazioni configurando le vostre istruzioni personalizzate. Scoprite anche i punti di attenzione da considerare per un utilizzo ottimale.

I GPT
Scoprite il funzionamento dei GPT, queste mini applicazioni iperspecializzate che a volte possono superare ChatGPT. Imparate a creare il vostro GPT passo dopo passo. Padroneggiate le chiamate API per massimizzare le capacità di ChatGPT e scoprite alla fine della sezione come monetizzare i vostri GPT e, più in generale, come guadagnare denaro grazie a ChatGPT.

Gestione delle API e Playground
Esplorate il playground di ChatGPT e scoprite le nuove funzionalità che offre. Imparate a chiamare l'API di ChatGPT con livelli di difficoltà crescenti. Potrete così utilizzare ChatGPT al di fuori dell'interfaccia, creare un chatbot su un altro sito o anche integrare ChatGPT in altri software come Google Sheets o Excel, per esempio.
targetAudiences: Chiunque desideri padroneggiare l'IA e ChatGPT. Questa formazione è per tutti i livelli.

courseDetails.title: Professional Scrum Master I (PSM I) Certification Prep
courseDetails.shortDescription: [UNOFFICIAL] Scrum Master Certification (PSM I) Prep Course. Pass the Scrum Master Exam! NEW Scrum Guide!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Course Description:

Scrum Master Certification


Unlock the Full Potential of Agile with the Scrum Master Certification from Agile Enterprise Coach, London

Welcome to the Scrum Master Certification Certification Assessment, a comprehensive evaluation designed for individuals seeking to confirm their understanding and proficiency in the Scrum framework. This assessment is not a theoretical course but a practical examination that reflects real-world scenarios and applications of Scrum, as outlined in the Official Scrum Guide.



For Employees/ Individuals: Advance Your Agile Career

As an aspiring or current Advanced Scrum Master, this assessment will serve as a benchmark for your Scrum knowledge and skills, allowing you to:

  • Validate Expertise: Demonstrate your mastery of the Scrum framework and stand out in a competitive job market.

  • Professional Development: Identify your strengths and areas for growth, guiding your learning journey in Agile practices.

  • Career Advancement: Enhance your resume and LinkedIn profile with the certification, opening doors to new opportunities and career growth.

  • Credibility and Recognition: Gain the confidence of peers and employers with a certification that showcases your commitment to the Agile mindset.


For Organisations/Scrum Teams : Elevate Your Team's Agile Capabilities

In the fast-paced world of technology and product management, Agile methodologies have become the cornerstone of successful product delivery. Implementing Scrum within your organization can revolutionize the way you manage projects, enhance team collaboration, and drive better product outcomes. Our Scrum Master Certification Certification Assessment offers numerous advantages for your organisation:

  • Skill Validation: Ensure that your Scrum team members possess a solid understanding of Scrum practices, principles, and values.

  • Team Efficiency: Identify Scrum Masters who can lead and facilitate Agile teams to higher levels of productivity and efficiency.

  • Continuous Improvement: Pinpoint areas where your teams excel and where they need further training, fostering a culture of continuous learning and development.

  • Competitive Edge: By having certified Scrum Masters, your company can stay ahead of the curve in Agile product management, attracting clients and projects that value certified expertise.


The Role of a Scrum Master: Facilitator of Agile Excellence

The Scrum Master is a pivotal role within Scrum teams, acting as a facilitator, coach, and servant leader. As a Scrum Master, you are responsible for:

  • Ensuring Scrum Adoption: Guide your team in following Scrum practices, principles, and rules as described in the Official Scrum Guide.

  • Facilitating Scrum Events: Conduct effective Sprint Planning, Daily Scrums, Sprint Reviews, and Sprint Retrospectives to maximize collaboration and progress.

  • Impediment Removal: Address and eliminate obstacles that hinder your team's performance, ensuring a smooth path to project completion.

  • Coaching and Mentoring: Empower your team by promoting self-organization, cross-functionality, and continuous improvement in Agile practices.

Why Choose Our  Scrum Master Certification Certification Assessment?

Our assessment is meticulously crafted to reflect the depth and breadth of the Scrum framework as per the Official Scrum Guide. Here’s what sets our Scrum Master Certification Assessment apart:

  • Real-World Relevance: Questions are designed to challenge and reflect real-life scenarios that Scrum Masters encounter, ensuring practical understanding.

  • Comprehensive Coverage: The assessment spans all essential Scrum topics, from roles and artifacts to events, providing a thorough evaluation of your Scrum knowledge.

  • Instant Feedback: Upon completion, receive immediate insights into your performance, helping you to pinpoint questions for further study or confirmation of your expertise.

  • Scrum Master Certification : Successful candidates can request a Scrum Master Certification Certificate for this course to be issued by Agile Enterprise coach, London adding a tangible credential to their professional portfolio.

Assessment Structure and Content

The Scrum Master Certification Assessment consists of a series of multiple-choice questions covering a wide range of topics, including but not limited to:

  • Scrum Theory and Principles

  • The Scrum Team: Roles and Responsibilities

  • Scrum Events: Sprint Planning, Daily Scrum, Sprint Review, and Sprint Retrospective

  • Scrum Artifacts: Product Backlog, Sprint Backlog, and Increment

  • Definition of Done

How to Get Certified

  1. Watch all the videos available in this Scrum Master Certification course

  2. Study the Official Scrum Guide: Familiarize yourself with all the concepts and guidelines.

  3. Take the Assessment: Complete the multiple-choice questions to the best of your ability.

  4. Submit Proof of Completion: Send us screenshots of your completed tests to us to receive your Scrum Master Certification from Agile Enterprise Coach.

  5. Add to Your Credentials: Include your certification in your CV .


About Me: Vipesh Singla, MBA, Agile Enterprise Coach

Embark on a journey of transformation with Vipesh Singla, a seasoned Agile Enterprise Coach with an impressive track record. Certified and licensed as a SAFe Agile Coach and SAFe Practice Consultant, I bring a wealth of experience to the table.

Throughout my career, I have played pivotal roles in Agile Transformations and Product Management Assignments for a diverse array of Global 2000 companies. Notably, I've collaborated with esteemed clients and employers from prestigious groups such as GAFAM, Big 4, Big Tech, Big Pharma, Fortune 100, and FTSE 100. My versatility shines through various roles, including Product Manager, Product Owner, Scrum Master, and Agile Coach.

Education forms the foundation of my expertise, holding both an MBA and a Bachelor of Engineering degree from one of India's prestigious institutes. As a certified SAFe SPC/Agile Coach, I bring a proven track record of driving successful Agile transformations.

With a track record that speaks volumes, I am proud to be at the forefront of Agile and Scrum coaching. Boasting a remarkable achievement of over 90,000 registrations across all my programs, I have had the privilege of influencing and guiding a diverse community of 50,000 unique students.

My digital presence extends globally, reaching enthusiasts and professionals in 152 countries. This widespread outreach has allowed me to connect with a vast audience, transcending language barriers. Our community is not confined to English alone; we thrive in a multilingual environment, with students conversing in 40 languages.

As an Agile Enterprise Coach, my commitment is to empower individuals worldwide with the knowledge and skills necessary for success in the dynamic field of product management. Join me on this transformative journey, and let's navigate the realm of Agile Product Management together.


Conclusion

Whether you're an individual looking to solidify your Scrum expertise or a company aiming to enhance your team's Agile practices, our Scrum Master Certification Assessment is the stepping stone to achieving professional excellence in Agile project management. Embrace the opportunity to validate your knowledge, improve your skills, and advance your career with our Scrum Master Certification Professional Certification Assessment.
